title: Crew Show! (Gridlife, Ducati Monster, driving a Cup Car)
description:
Matt Farah and Zack Klapman talk about their drive in the $500,000 Guntherwerks 911, Zack’s crazy weekend at Gridlife, scaring Hoonigans, Matt's ride on the Duacti Monster, and we give a lot of car buying advice.

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire14 and use code smokingtire14 for up to 14 free meals plus free shipping.


JB Weld is available at JBWeld.com, Walmart, Amazon, Home Depot, Lowe's, Autozone, Advanced Auto Parts, NAPA, O'Reilly, Michael's, and more.
 

Go to NordVPN.com/smokingtire or use code TIRE to get a 2-year plan plus a bonus gift with a huge discount.
